article_title: Why Aren't Physicians Part Of The Health Reform Conversation?

article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck

og.description: The field of medicine is one of the most heavily regulated industries in the United States. Yet, physicians are seldom called upon to provide insights and recommendations relative to health policy formulation. Walker Ray, MD, President of the Physicians Foundation and Tim Norbeck, CEO, share their thoughts on why this needs to change.
